settings.title: Introducing the revolutionary TECHNOFITTED JEANS™
settings.content: Our exclusive designs handle each curve to adjust, shape and lift your figure in a natural way without padding, correctly elevating your feminine style.

settings.title: Medium-RISE
settings.subtitle: Our interpretation of the regular Mid- Rise Skinny jeans that enhance your  silhouette.
settings.note: Model is 1.75cm/5' 9" and is wearing  a size 2

settings.title: HIGH-RISE
settings.subtitle: Our interpretation of the regular  High-Rise Skinny jeans that enhance your  silhouette.
settings.note: Model is 1.77cm/5' 9" and is  wearing a size 28

settings.title: Curvy HIGH-RISE
settings.subtitle: Our interpretation of the regular High- Rise Skinny in Plus Size, that enhance your  silhouette.
settings.note: Model is 1.80cm/5'11" and is  wearing a size 38

settings.title: As experts, we celebrate the curves, and we believe that jeans are for every-body.
settings.subtitle: Once you try OH POMP!, you’ll never want to wear anything else.
